alert.note: Alert for Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 6:59PM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTH CENTRAL YATES COUNTY... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms produced between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain in the area. Rain had diminished, however, flash flooding due to runoff is still likely. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Penn Yan, Benton, Ferguson Corners, Yatesville, Bellona Stn and Milo Mills. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
